website_summaries.verdict: Sophisticated bathtub engineered for the deep soak experience.
pros: Lumbar support is available for indulgent experiences while providing support to your back
Rectangular design looks stylish in a modern home

customer_reviews.title: Deep tub for a standard tub space.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a small bathroom but you'd like a deeper tub for soaking, then this is the one you should get! Fit perfectly into our small bathroom. We weren't able to make room for a bigger tub in our bathroom but wanted to be able to comfortably soak in a tub. This tub is just right.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hopson

customer_reviews.title: The perfect soaking tub!
customer_reviews.text: Great tub! Exactly what I was looking for. But, my bathroom did not feel the same way. Although it measured perfectly in length, I did not pay attention to the width!!!! It is huge!!!! The perfect soaking tub! Sadly, Had to return. Customer service was excellent and immediately helped me with the problem. I am hoping to add a tub to the basement BR and will come back for her!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Vega

customer_reviews.title: great tub- we mad a mistake and did not consider ...
customer_reviews.text: great tub- we mad a mistake and did not consider the width of old tub now the faucets are off center. Our bad, this is a great tub.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Clanton

customer_reviews.title: It’s decent..
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this product through a blog I follow....love the tub, but could’ve bought another for a lesser price. I love the sleek design, but wish I measured the height as sometimes it’s a bit of a pain to get in. Would most definitely buy again, but only at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: AmaZoNAsH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bathtub - make sure to check your hardware
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, deep bathtub, but make sure you get the correct accessory hardware for the overflow and joints.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D

customer_reviews.title: Nice and deep
customer_reviews.text: Just tried out the new tub last night. Nice and deep, and looks great in the newly remodeled bathroom. Very happy with the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery . Need to put a mat to solve the problem
customer_reviews.text: Super slippery. Fell at least 5 times and broke my nails 😂
customer_reviews.author: EBaker

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell from the photo but the back is slanted with some lumbar support and is SOOO comfortable! I love this tub... have had it installed for just a few days and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: buyingonline

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tub
customer_reviews.text: Great tub....we bought this for a new house and the plumber who installed it said "wow, nice tub!" It is deep and very nice to soak in!
customer_reviews.author: Nancybbc

customer_reviews.title: Self-install is difficult
customer_reviews.text: If you are installing in an alcove that is already drywalled in on the other side of the studs, and it's hard to access the plumbing, you will have some difficulty installing this yourself - could be worth it to hire a plumber to save some frustration! The instructions for leveling are not very clear, and the leveling blocks are near impossible to reach once the tub is in place in an enclosed alcove. Would recommend a mortar bed installation, even though they say it's not required. Tub is nice - good, simple style.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Jones

customer_reviews.title: Received the tube it is beautiful but after placing it we noticed what seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the tube it is beautiful but after placing it we noticed what seem to be a empty dull spott hallow on floor don't know what to do waiting for company to tell us how to fix it wish I would have noticed it sooner
customer_reviews.author: Leslie diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good tub
customer_reviews.text: Good tub. Good quality and looks great. It's been installed for 5-mos in my guest bath. Exactly what I expected and delivery was perfect. I would definitely purchase in this manner again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris VH

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Pros, but a few cons
customer_reviews.text: Depth is really nice, but I'm not a big guy at 5'9" and there is no way the ridges can support arms...just not practical... It is a significant improvement over our old tub so not unhappy with the purchase, but since this is such a personal choice, I'd suggest seeing in person before buying.
customer_reviews.author: JPK17

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, classic but updated for any bathroom. Easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Asmus

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tub...expensive accessories
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the tub is nice and sturdy. The plumber told us that it's one of the best mid-range tubs you can buy and I think he was right. We used the mortar bed installation due to it being in an alcove and 'blind leveling' isn't terribly easy/accurate. Haven't used it yet but it sure looks nice. Filled with water three or four times - drain works well (opens when full of water) and drains quickly. No bowing at the front as indicated in other reviews. Plan to spend another $150 on the overflow and such.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: just okay, buy the drain spout is cool that goes with it.
customer_reviews.author: SM & IG

customer_reviews.title: Great Tub!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of online searcing and reviewing before purchasing this tub. We wanted a deeper soaking tub for a new bathroom remodel and we love it! It looks great and seems really sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: Every time you move at all, it squeaks horribly. The floor after 5 years pushed through just by stepping on it. I weigh 230 lbs. not impressed, very upset
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub, but it came with a significant scratch ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tub, but it came with a significant scratch on the bottom lefthand side. I didn't notice it until a few weeks later when it was being installed, but decided to still install it since I was on a tight timeline, and it was in a place that was less noticeable. Still wish the scratch wasn't there since it kind of bugs me.
customer_reviews.author: themoonisdown

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Looks fabulous in the bathroom. Though I haven't gotten to use it yet with construction delays, everyone keeps commenting on it.
customer_reviews.author: FDP

customer_reviews.title: Koehler K Bathtubs
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell enough how much I love this tub. It is so elegant and has a classic look to it.When guess go in the bathroom I always get so many complements. Everybody love the tub. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great tub
customer_reviews.text: I like a bath every now and then but my old tub got dirty easily and did not maintain water temperature. This tub not only looks great but is so much a better quality tub. It is comfy and much easier to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Meah
customer_reviews.text: Meah, I think you can find cleaner lines elsewhere for less $$. Was installed level, but will not drain a small puddle by the drain hole, left and right - so not sure what's wrong with the design...
customer_reviews.author: Saber

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with this product. The drain doesn't close ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product. The drain doesn't close all the way, which you do not learn until you have already installed the tub. Am trying to get a replacement part, but this is slow going and we cannot use the bathtub in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: Bennat

customer_reviews.title: Sold as "like new" but arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: I called Amazon before I ordered this bathtub, and was told that it was an open box item but otherwise like new. I called Kohler and sent them a picture and they told me it is defective and to definitely NOT install it. This has delayed my contractor for two weeks while we have been waiting for a new tub to arrive - very costly delay!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the depth!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tub. Got it for my bathroom remodel a year ago and just love how deep it is. Truly a great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Operabethie

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because it was a Kohler brand and I expected it to be of better quality. I had no experience with acrylic tubs as have always used fiberglass but the dimensions were exactly what we wanted and it looked good. Of course it looks great out of the box and you don't know all the flaws till it is installed and you go to use it. The wall edge is not straight, it has a dip in it and water collects there. It squeaks like crazy when you get in and out. If you sit on the edge you can feel the side flexing it is so weak. I would not recommend this tub to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this tub!
customer_reviews.text: I have the tub with the oil bronze trim pieces. Yes the oil bronze is a little darker then I expected but they are not black as others have mentioned. The effect is still very beautiful and I get so many compliments on both the tub and the faucet. The drain assembly works perfectly .. and its nice to be able to just press and release to stop or unstop the drain. We love the tub, had no trouble whatsoever with installation and our floor was very unlevel (basement bathroom). We hired a very competent plumber who knew his stuff and he had no complaints. I would definitely recommend this tub.
customer_reviews.author: KSW

customer_reviews.title: ... had the tub for 3 years and it's been great. It really is deep because of the high ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had the tub for 3 years and it's been great. It really is deep because of the high overflow drain. We haven't had any problems with the foot drain other than it can get a bit unscrewed maybe a quarter turn. We haven't had any problems with the drain getting sucked closed during draining as other people have even with the tub full. We did get a pretty big gouge in it when a hammer fell in and we haven't found a way to fix it, but it hasn't gotten any worse. I wish the drain and fittings came in actual stainless steel instead of chrome.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: Have not had any of the problems mentioned by other reviewers. Apron does not bow, drain works just as it should. Armrests are a nice feature. Materials feel solid for what they are, and the tub allows for a very deep soak. We had glass installed on the apron side and the tub fully supports a heavy pane of glass. Finally, it looks great and was very affordable. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: AJM

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-1123-RA-0 Archer 5-Foot Bath with Comfort Depth Design, Integral Apron and Right-Hand Drain, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteTaking its design cues from traditional Craftsman furniture, the Archer line of baths reveals beveled edges and curved bases for a clean, sophisticated style. This bath offers a low step-over height while allowing for deep, comfortable soaking. A lumbar arch gently support the natural curves of your body.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Archer bath features Comfort Depth design, a deep soaking experience with a low step-over height. This exclusive design offers a relaxing bath experience that is easy to enter and exit. Water depth is raised to the same level as a standard 20" - 21" tall bath through the unique slotted overflow. The transitional aesthetic of the Archer Suite also complements many different bathroom décors.
feature_bullets: Slotted overflow and Comfort Depth design offers a convenient 19-inch step-over height while retaining the same depth as a standard 21-inch bath
Molded lumbar arch gently supports the natural curves of your body
Requires K-7271 or K-7272 Clearflo slotted overflow bath drain (sold separately)
Integral flange helps prevent water from seeping behind wall and simplifies alcove installation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars45 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
